ResourceHeader.Description: MEDOC is a facility hosted at the Institut d'Astrophysique Spatiale (IAS), a mixed entity from Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) and l'Université Paris-Sud, in collaboration with the Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales (CNES).

AccessURL.Name: IAS-MEDOC solar data archive web page
AccessURL.Description: IAS-MEDOC solar data archive web page, allowing searches on the data from the SOHO mission, the TRACE satellite, the CORONAS/SPIRIT instrument and the STEREO/SECCHI instruments
